videoIdea: Brand teaser showing your shop, baristas, and coffee.
description: Kick off the month with a 15s cinematic intro of your business.
label: Welcome to KapeSiglo
caption: Start July strong with a cinematic welcome to KapeSiglo!

videoIdea: Timelapse of brewing methods: espresso, pour-over, cold brew.
description: Show the skill and care behind each cup of coffee.
label: Behind the Brew
caption: Take a peek behind the scenes of your brewing process.

videoIdea: Pan shots of interiors with lofi music.
description: Highlight your store as a peaceful place to unwind.
label: Cafe Ambiance
caption: Feel the cozy and calming vibe inside KapeSiglo.

videoIdea: Cultural greeting with peaceful visuals and text overlay.
description: Celebrate with your Muslim community with respect and warmth.
label: Eid al-Adha Greeting
caption: Sending warm wishes to our Muslim community this Eid al-Adha.

videoIdea: Shot of the first cup of the day from opening to serving.
description: Make your audience feel the weekend comfort with coffee.
label: Saturday Coffee Ritual
caption: Embrace your Saturday morning ritual with our first cup of the day.

videoIdea: Short interview or intro of one staff member.
description: Build trust and authenticity through your team.
label: Meet the Barista
caption: Get to know the faces behind your favorite coffee.

videoIdea: Feature your most-ordered coffee with a creative reel.
description: Use a visual hook to highlight your best drink.
label: Best Seller Highlight
caption: Spotlight on our top-selling drink—loved by all!

videoIdea: Montage of people working on laptops with drinks.
description: Position your café as a good workspace too.
label: Coffee & Productivity
caption: Fuel your focus with coffee in a cozy workspace.

videoIdea: Quick tips on how to make better coffee at home.
description: Establish authority by sharing knowledge.
label: Brewing Tips
caption: Learn simple tips to upgrade your home coffee game.

videoIdea: Use trending meme audio with a coffee twist.
description: Lighten the mood with humor your audience relates to.
label: Coffee Meme Day
caption: Laugh along with us as coffee meets memes!

videoIdea: Highlight a regular customer or small biz shoutout.
description: Make followers feel part of something bigger.
label: Community Feature
caption: Celebrate the amazing people who support KapeSiglo.

videoIdea: Slow-mo of latte art being created.
description: Visual satisfaction + barista skill = engagement.
label: Latte Art Showcase
caption: Watch the magic of latte art unfold in slow motion.

videoIdea: Relaxing b-roll shots with acoustic music.
description: Promote a slow day experience with your coffee.
label: Sunday Chill
caption: Unwind this Sunday with a chill cup of coffee.

videoIdea: IG Story or reel: 'Guess the bean!' or fun trivia.
description: Make learning about coffee interactive and fun.
label: Coffee Quiz
caption: Time to test your coffee knowledge—are you a true fan?

videoIdea: Video about the farms or suppliers you work with.
description: Be transparent and proud about your sourcing.
label: Behind the Beans
caption: See where our beans come from—local and proud.

videoIdea: Text-based quote with coffee shots in the background.
description: Keep your audience inspired and caffeinated.
label: Midweek Motivation
caption: Get over the hump with a motivational sip!

videoIdea: Best-selling dessert paired with a drink.
description: Mouthwatering visuals drive orders and interest.
label: Kape + Dessert Combo
caption: Dessert and coffee: name a better duo—we'll wait.

videoIdea: Throwback to your first store or post.
description: Celebrate how far you’ve come with your audience.
label: Flashback Friday
caption: Throwing it back to our humble beginnings.

videoIdea: Quick reactions of people tasting something new.
description: Real reactions build credibility.
label: Customer Reactions
caption: Watch real customers try and react to something new!

videoIdea: Close-up shots of grinding, pouring, foaming.
description: Appeal to sensory enjoyment.
label: Coffee Prep ASMR
caption: Satisfy your senses with relaxing coffee prep sounds.

videoIdea: Blurry shot with audio reveal of a new menu item.
description: Create anticipation.
label: New Item Tease
caption: Something new is brewing—can you guess what it is?

videoIdea: Reel of people answering: 'One change you want in PH'
description: Make coffee a platform for honest discussion.
label: SONA Reflection
caption: Let’s reflect on change over coffee this SONA season.

videoIdea: Use viral TikTok audio in a cafe twist.
description: Show you’re in touch with online culture.
label: Recreate a Trend
caption: Hop on the latest trend—KapeSiglo style!

videoIdea: Flat lay of drinks, pastries, table decor.
description: Visuals that influencers and cafe lovers enjoy.
label: Aesthetic Table Setup
caption: Feast your eyes on our beautifully set tables.

videoIdea: Shot of art displayed in your shop or mini-performance.
description: Engage with the creative community.
label: Feature a Local Artist
caption: Showcasing talent from our creative community.

videoIdea: Focus on merch, beans, or reusable cups.
description: Promote what else you sell outside drinks.
label: Product Spotlight
caption: More than drinks—check out our featured products!

videoIdea: Owner shares a story about the cafe or life lesson.
description: Add heart and personal values to your brand.
label: Sunday Story
caption: A heartfelt story straight from the heart of KapeSiglo.

videoIdea: Compile reels/posts from customers who tagged you.
description: Show love to your supportive audience.
label: UGC Appreciation
caption: Thanks for sharing your moments at KapeSiglo!

videoIdea: Overlay text: 'I drink coffee because ___'
description: Encourage interaction in stories or comments.
label: Question of the Day
caption: Tell us—why do you love coffee?

videoIdea: Mashup of all content and smiles from the month.
description: Celebrate your consistency and creativity.
label: July Recap
caption: A look back at all the good vibes this July!

videoIdea: Poll or question: What do you want to see next month?
description: Involve followers in your August planning.
label: Ask Your Audience
caption: What content would you love to see next month?
